sait.frms.manager

Class ReservationManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • sait.frms.manager.ReservationManager

  • public class ReservationManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Reservation manager to manage all the reservations from binary file The data is I/O from "res/reservations.bin" The database is using logic delete, which means that inactive reservations will be kept in the database
    Author:
    Mengqiu (Roger) Chen, Ebele Egenti, AJ Russell De Leon, Dmitriy Fominykh

      ReservationManager()
      Constructor loading data from binary file

      Make a reservation according to the booked flight and user information If the flight is unavailable, the reservation won't happen This method will check empty name and citizenship
      void persist()
      Write record from reservations to random access file The size of reservation object in random access file is 1 + 10 + 10 + 20 + 50 + 30 + 8 = 129 bytes
      private void populateFromBinary()
      read reservations from binary file

    • Method Detail

      • makeReservation

        public Reservation makeReservation(Flight flight,
                                   java.lang.String name,
                                   java.lang.String citizenship)
                            throws NullClientNameException,
                                   NullCitizenshipException,
                                   SeatUnavailableException
        Make a reservation according to the booked flight and user information If the flight is unavailable, the reservation won't happen This method will check empty name and citizenship
        Parameters:
        flight - Flight object
        name - Client name
        citizenship - Client citizenship
        Returns:
        reservation object
        Throws:
        NullClientNameException - Thrown if client name is empty
        NullCitizenshipException - Thrown if client citizenship is empty
        SeatUnavailableException - Thrown if no more seat available

      • updateReservation

        public void updateReservation(Reservation r,
                              java.lang.String _name,
                              java.lang.String _citizenship,
                              boolean status)
                       throws NullClientNameException,
                              NullCitizenshipException
        Update reservation according to user input
        Parameters:
        r - Reservation
        _name - Client name
        _citizenship - Client citizenship
        status - Is it active?
        Throws:
        NullClientNameException - Thrown if client name is empty
        NullCitizenshipException - Thrown if citizenship is empty

        public java.util.ArrayList<Reservation> findReservation(java.lang.String _code,

        Search through all the reservations and find out matching record then add them to an arraylist
        Parameters:

        _airline - Airline name
        _name - Client name
        Returns:
        foundReservations Arraylist of found reservations

      • findReservationByCode

        public Reservation findReservationByCode(java.lang.String code)
        Search through reservations and find matching reservation according to the given code
        Parameters:
        code - Reservation code
        Returns:
        reservation if found, null if not found

      • persist

        public void persist()
             throws java.io.IOException
        Write record from reservations to random access file The size of reservation object in random access file is 1 + 10 + 10 + 20 + 50 + 30 + 8 = 129 bytes
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
